job_tasks.phrase: Add new capabilities for data integration, transformation, and visualization using LLMs
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions using LLMs for data integration, transformation, and visualization, which falls under the 'Modeling' category as it involves generative AI techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: AI & Machine Learning : Collaborate on next-gen AI features, from statistics and time series forecasting to LLM inference.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly indicates work on AI and ML features, including LLM inference, which is a core aspect of the 'Modeling' task.

job_tasks.phrase: Build next-generation features like cross-provider LLM APIs or integration with the latest Machine Learning models
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to building features related to LLM APIs and integrating with ML models, which is a 'Modeling' task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with research teams on innovative machine learning experiments
job_tasks.justification: Working on 'machine learning experiments' directly aligns with the 'Modeling' category, which involves creating and training models.

job_tasks.phrase: MLOps : Develop back-end capabilities for automating and monitoring ML model lifecycles while supporting cross-functional collaboration.
job_tasks.justification: The explicit mention of 'MLOps', 'automating and monitoring ML model lifecycles' falls directly under the 'Operations Engineering (MLOps)' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Build tools to automate retraining, monitoring, and deployment of ML models
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes specific MLOps activities: automating retraining, monitoring, and deployment of ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Data Preparation : Develop tools for data integration, transformation, and cataloging, as well as Jupyter notebooks, SQL workbenches, and APIs.
job_tasks.justification: Developing tools, notebooks, workbenches, and APIs are all aspects of 'Software Development'.

job_tasks.phrase: Platform : Focus on scaling and securing the platform while improving cloud integrations and supporting a wide array of data sources and engines.
job_tasks.justification: Scaling, securing a platform, improving integrations, and supporting data sources are all 'Software Development' tasks related to building robust systems.

job_tasks.phrase: AI Governance : Build features for AI compliance, connecting disparate systems and simplifying governance processes.
job_tasks.justification: Building features to connect systems and simplify processes relates to 'Software Development'.

job_tasks.phrase: AI Governance : Build features for AI compliance, connecting disparate systems and simplifying governance processes.
job_tasks.justification: Developing features for AI compliance and governance implies understanding and addressing business needs related to regulatory and ethical aspects of AI.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with LLMs, LLM inference, and building next-generation AI features that utilize generative models. While MLOps and software development tasks are present, the core focus on LLMs and AI features aligns most closely with the GenAI Engineer profile.
